hero.title: Macau Field Pack
hero.subtitle: Optimized for compact-territory movement, terminal crossings, and event surge windows.

sections.title: Arrival and Entry
sections.summary: Treat entry timing as variable and protect downstream reservations with buffer.
actions: Predefine post-arrival route for ferry, bridge, or airport mode.
Store accommodation address in two language formats.

sections.title: Mobility and Route Resilience
sections.summary: Use compact geography to your advantage by running short, reversible route loops.
actions: Avoid committing to non-reversible late-night transfers.
Track one pedestrian-safe fallback in each zone.

sections.title: Payments and Connectivity
sections.summary: Keep at least two payment instruments active for terminal and hospitality contexts.
actions: Cache confirmation IDs for lodging and transportation.
Verify mobile data continuity before high-demand windows.

sections.title: Disruption Playbook
sections.summary: If one route stalls, switch sequence and preserve final checkpoint certainty.
actions: Reorder visits by nearest reachable area.
Protect ferry or departure terminal timing first.
Send one consolidated ETA update to any hosts.
